Sleep time for You should not be less than 12 hours.

You need to sleep 8 hours a day and follow the principle of early bed and early morning.
You need a 7-hour sleep, and they should guarantee a “high quality sleep time” from 10pm to 5am. Because people can easily reach deep sleep at this time, it helps relieve fatigue.
You should sleep before 12 every night. Sleep time should not exceed 7 hours and not less than 5.5 hours.
